issue.title: Check for confirmation popups
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

For every panels of the administration, it should be verify if a confirmation popup is set up for actions such as "delete"... 
for now, there are no such things which can be dramatic (lost of a configuration for example)

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hello Xavier,

A very old post that seems to be lost...
Is it still some problem with this logical in V2?
If yes, can someone described per module (SHOP, CATALOG, ...) where it happens ?

Thanks

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Update :

I checkek the whole backend for :

* CATALOG -> OK !

* MONITOR -> OK !

* PUBLISH  : OK ! (actually not concerned since no delete action is available)

* CORE -> not OK - seems that all of the delete actions have no "confirmation" pop-up implemented.(examples : deleting a language, a user or a group of users)

* SHOP -> not OK - seems that all of the delete actions have no "confirmation" pop-up implemented.

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

According to what I have seen, it is now effective within EasySDI V4.

If so, ticket should be closed.
